title: Front Page Sports Football Pro 98 (REDUX)
description:
This is a compilation I made on a Front Page Sports Football Pro 98 ISO. It's getting harder and harder to find these games, so I compiled what I could in a single disc.

What I've done is compiled a bunch of plays, classic league/teams, utilites and a majority (see NOTE below) of the games:

1992 - Front Page Sports Football
1993 - Front Page Sports Football Pro
1994 - Front Page Sports Football Pro '95
1995 - Front Page Sports Football Pro '96
1996 - Front Page Sports Football Pro '97
1997 - Front Page Sports Football Pro '98
1998 - Front Page Sports Football Pro '99

--------------------------------------------------------
NOTE: I cannot get an ISO or game files for '96' or '99', so they are the only FULL games missing from this selection but I have included the PATCH files for each game.


INSTALLATION:       [The ISO only installs FBPro 98]

1. It's gotta be mounted with MagicDisc, PowerISO, etc
2. Run Setup (try to use compatibility settings if your on 64-bit)
3. Install Patches (located on disc)

TO ACCESS OTHER FILES:
Just explore the disc and copy and paste, drag and drop, the files and games you want to play/use. I have READ-ME files through out. I use LibreOffice for my documents if you don't understand the file association. It's a great program and I recommend it.

If anybody has an ISO for 96 or 99 I could add to this, email me    (seriously, that's the email to reach me)

Please Enjoy!!
